RobotCmd - Class in s3games.robot
This class knows the details of the SSC-32 serial communication protocol, and translates the meaningful commands into low-level strings that are sent over the serial line to the SSC-32 servo controller
RobotCmd(RobotCmd.Command, double[]) - Constructor for class s3games.robot.RobotCmd

RobotCmd.Command - Enum in s3games.robot
